extension.valueString: American Society of Clinical Oncology Author

name: BRCA1AndBRCA2Testing
title: BRCA1 and BRCA2 Testing
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for the procedure of BRCA1 and BRCA2 testing.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a procedure for BRCA1 and BRCA2 testing.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts related to BRCA1 and BRCA2 by Immune Stain.)
